Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22

Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Arn.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 2048

Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
